name: Lilies and Daruma- Hana's Route
description:
PLEASE READ: This game contains graphic content and topics that some users may be sensitive to. If you don't want to be exposed to certain topics, please visit https://www.tumblr.com/blog/liliesanddaruma-warnings for more information.

When Sayuri Sato moves away from her childhood home, she leaves behind her first love; an unrequited crush on her female best friend! She vows to never again let her heart get broken: "I'm going to become someone who isn't afraid to confess their love!!"

Play from Sayuri's point of view as she navigates difficult choices about romance and her life. The player will make choices that will teach Sayuri the meaning behind queer romances, shyness, trauma, bullying, demisexuality, family, and the words, "I love you."

This visual novel made in Renpy is only 2/3 complete! I wasn't able to finish before the jam deadline. If it's going to bother you not to finish right away, please wait a few months! I should have the rest ready to go soon. 

If you like this game and want to learn about it's development ( or if you want to contact me regarding an error) please visit https://www.tumblr.com/blog/liliesanddaruma to learn more, or email me at liliesanddaruma@gmail.com . I'm always interested in feedback or volunteers!

(Note: this is a rebranded and more polished version of my game uploaded last year, My Sweet Daruma.)
